text.s: By asking relevant questions and conducting academically sound research to find solutions, communication scholars, with ICA as their premier academic association, are uniquely poised to answer questions of real societal import. Find out more about ICA membership by clicking here.

ICA Conferences include some of the premier scholars in communication studies worldwide. We aim to advance the scholarly study of human communication by encouraging and facilitating excellence in academic research. Visit our conference website for information about current, past, and future ICA conferences.
ICA presents nine prestigious research awards to communication scholars at our annual awards ceremony. Learn more about the awards, past recipients, or click here for nomination guidelines.

ICA publishes the best available scholarship on all aspects of communication. Each of our five highly ranked journals and other publications offer high quality research and analyses from diverse theoretical and methodological approaches from all fields of communication, media and cultural studies.

ICA Members: The annual election of officers and section officers is open now until October 14th. Read the candidates' statements here or as a pop up window during the voting process. When you sign in to the election site, you will see a personalized ballot based on the divisions and interest groups of which you are a member. To vote go to the ICA voting site

International Communication Association's mission is to advance the scholarly study of human communication by encouraging and facilitating excellence in academic research worldwide.

ICA membership include subscriptions to any of our journals. Full-text online access to ALL previously published ICA journals are available to members. To see other membership benefits, visit our membership benefits page. To join ICA, visit our membership application site. If you are a current or former member wishing to renew, click here to renew or reinstate your membership!

We would like to thank you for considering a donation to the International Communication Association. ICA is a not-for-profit that relies primarily on membership and conference fees and publication royalties for its income. Although ICA has been doing well financially in recent years, the organization needs to look toward its future. In doing so, ICA hopes to establish the resources necessary to pursue the Association's mission.

Every donation aids ICA in achieving our mission to advance the scholarly study of human communication by encouraging and facilitating excellence in academic research worldwide. Your contribution is an investment in the future of communication research and helps build a solid foundation for future scholars. ICA offers its know-how to everybody and every area of the world where the norms of personal freedom and democracy are upheld and assists our members in actively contributing to public debate on topics relative to our mission. For more information or to make a donation, start at http://www.icahdq.org/fundraising/
